channel.description: Recent content in Nodes on justin.napolitano

item.title: networks
item.description: Networks This post is a work in progress. I am thinking through nodes within a network. I will update this as time permits. Intuition Every bit is important A node cannot isolate from a system A node must balance to the connections in their connective pool. Every bit is important Every signal is important physical information. The signals relayed amongst the collection of individuals within a system reveals the state of the system at any given point in time.
